original_text: The sun and moon stood still in their habitation: at the light of thine arrows they went, and at the shining of thy glittering spear.
korean_text: 날아가는 주의 화살의 빛과 번쩍이는 주의 창의 광채로 말미암아 해와 달이 그 처소에 멈추었나이다

sentences.original_text: The sun and moon stood still
at the light of thine arrows they went
at the shining of thy glittering spear
